content:
At the request of the prosecutors of the People's Deputy from the forbidden Party "OPZZ", a preventive measure in the form of detention for a period of two months was extended.

About thisreported March 13Office of the Prosecutor General.

The relevant decision was made by the Pechersk District Court of Kyiv.  People's Deputy of Ukraine Nestor Shufrych is suspected of high treason. He has been in custody for 6 months.

BeforeArmyInform reportedthat the FSB agent under church cover was neutralized in Kiev.
title: Nestor Shufrich will awaken in custody until May 11
description: This was reported on March 13 by the Office of the Prosecutor General. The corresponding decision made ...
author: Army Inform
